messages.content: You are a helpful assistant with access to code analysis tools.
Call the request_code_context tool to find SimpleStruct examples.

function.name: request_code_context
function.description: Request additional code context from the repository up to a token budget.

search_term.description: Search term guide which code guide hybrid semantic search and bm25.

token_budget.description: Optional maximum tokens of code context to return, sane defaults
